item.title: Premarkdown Plugins
item.description: I’m working on a preprocessor for Markdown documents. I write all my books in Markdown, so this is something I have wanted to do for a while, to scratch a few itches I have. I write my books in Markdown and then I process them using Pandoc. If you are not familiar with that setup, then I have written a short book on the topic: The Beginner’s Guide to Markdown and Pandoc. For that book, because it is very short, I just have a single Markdown document containing the entire book, but usually, I have one file per chapter. Pandoc doesn’t handle that, but you can cat the files before you convert the Markdown source to PDF or ePUB documents.
